author: Staff Reporter
text:
Speaking on the topic “Non-Violent Approach to Life” at the University of Madras, Nawabzada Mohammed Asif Ali, Dewan to the Prince of Arcot, said,

“Being content with your own self is very important for having a peaceful environment and having respect for other faiths is the basis for non-violence.”

As the chief guest at the event to mark the125th birth anniversary celebration of Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan, Mr. Ali addressed a gathering of teachers and students, including Ph. D Scholars and M.Phil Research Scholars.
title: ‘Respect for all faiths is basis for non-violence’
